Quick Tips and tricks

# Tip Usage
1 Escape Liquid Tags from parsing Use the liquid tag between raw and endraw using liquid syntax.
2 Syntax Highlighting using Rouge

Syntax highlighting can be performed via Rouge using the following syntax and changing the language as required 

<p>
<code>
<figure class="highlight">
<pre><code class="language-sql" data-lang="sql">
SELECT * FROM `users` WHERE `user`.`id` = 1
</code>
</pre>
</figure>
</code>
</p>
